item.title: Random stuff
item.description: We implemented the random feature. A feature that includes random functionality on all levels! Please beware of malfunction!

item.title: Nice news!
item.description: Here are some nice news, that should really be worth cheering! News are news!

item.title: New feature!
item.description: We are happy to announce the feature foo that makes the process of bar very easy! This is very cool!

item.title: Nice news!
item.description: Here are some nice news, that should really be worth cheering! News are news!

item.title: RSS feature added
item.description: RubySow got another new feature. Blogs are now processed into a RSS file that can be read from any client that supports the standard.

item.title: Blogging feature added
item.description: RubySow got a new feature. One can now generate a blog from flat and simple files.

item.title: v1.0alpha
item.description: Most of the functionality is already here and basic websites are working. There are still several bugs to iron out.

item.title: First version
item.description: The first commit was made to GitHub. Nothing is really working but it's something!
